Html: It would be great to be able to turn on and off the compression on a per project basis. That way we can reference the filenames for css/js created by chirpy but be able to disable their compression making debugging easier

Presently

1. menu "tools"

2. item "add-in manager..."

3. Uncheck checkbox on line Chirpy
Perhaps use a property in the .ï»¿csproj file, like those used by StyleCop, etc.
